channel.title: Thread Per Client fix errors
channel.description:
ok well i realeased my TPC fix a few days ago and then i find O! updated Tut by Graham and well now i need some help his update i found is on loading and saving so i read it like 5 times and then do as it says well errors and i am not sure how to fix them and i was wondering if someone could help me :D i know most people here won't know but i am hoping :)
[code] IOClient.java:238: illegal start of expression public PlayerSave loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) ^ IOClient.java:238: ';' expected public PlayerSave loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) ^ IOClient.java:238: ';' expected public PlayerSave loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) ^ IOClient.java:238: not a statement public PlayerSave loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) ^ IOClient.java:238: ';' expected public PlayerSave loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) ^ IOClient.java:254: illegal start of expression private void directFlushoutStream() throws java.io.IOException ^ IOClient.java:254: illegal start of expression private void directFlushoutStream() throws java.io.IOException ^ IOClient.java:254: ';' expected private void directFlushoutStream() throws java.io.IOException ^ IOClient.java:254: not a statement private void directFlushoutStream() throws java.io.IOException ^ IOClient.java:254: ';' expected private void directFlushoutStream() throws java.io.IOException ^ IOClient.java:261: illegal start of expression private boolean fillinStream(int ct) throws IOException { ^ IOClient.java:261: ';' expected private boolean fillinStream(int ct) throws IOException { ^ IOClient.java:261: ';' expected private boolean fillinStream(int ct) throws IOException { ^ IOClient.java:261: not a statement private boolean fillinStream(int ct) throws IOException { ^ IOClient.java:261: ';' expected private boolean fillinStream(int ct) throws IOException { ^ 15 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [/code] any help would be nice :)

item.title: Thread Per Client fix errors
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

I know you meant that you have a closing bracket… I was telling you that you need an opening one…

item.title: Thread Per Client fix errors
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Make

private void directFlushoutStream() throws java.io.IOException

This:

private void directFlushoutStream() throws java.io.IOException {

ok well i realeased my TPC fix a few days ago and then i find O! updated Tut by Graham and well now i need some help his update i found is on loading and saving so i read it like 5 times and then do as it says well errors and i am not sure how to fix them and i was wondering if someone could help me i know most people here won’t know but i am hoping
